content: in this legal case the ljubljana district court made a decision regarding an inheritance dispute the court determined that the deceased persons daughter and another individual are the heirs they reached an agreement to divide the assets which include real estate properties and funds in a personal bank account each heir received specific shares of the assets with one heir also receiving 6000 eur the court initiated succession proceedings based on the inheritance act since the deceased did not leave a will the court declared the daughters as heirs and determined the value of the estate based on the death certificate the court fee of 702 eur was split between the two heirs the decision of the court has become final but the heirs need to transfer the property and withdraw the funds after obtaining a certificate of final effect the text also explains the process of filing an appeal which must be done within 15 days of receiving the decision the appeal should be lodged with the court and include specific information the appeal will be decided by the ljubljana high court
